topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: The LID (Linear IRCd)
short_description: The LID is a complete rewrite of the wIRCd. It supports normal IRCd features, as well as extended features, such as host spoofing and a server-side scripting language for creating IRC bots.
